Package control

Class ManagerControl

Object
ManagerControl
public class ManagerControl extends Object
The ManagerControl class manages functionalities for a Manager, such as creating, editing, deleting projects, and generating reports for projects. It provides methods to interact with projects, including setting project parameters, filtering applications, and generating reports based on specific criteria.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • editProject

      public static void editProject(Manager manager, Project project, Scanner sc)
      Edits an existing project by updating its details such as project name, neighbourhood, available units, opening and closing dates, and officer slots. This method ensures that the opening date is not after the closing date, and officer slots do not exceed the maximum allowed.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager editing the project
      project - the project to be edited
      sc - the scanner object used to capture user input

    • createProject

      public static void createProject(Manager manager, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Creates a new project by taking input for project details such as project name, neighbourhood, available units, opening and closing dates, and officer slots. It ensures that the opening date is not after the closing date, and officer slots do not exceed the maximum allowed.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager creating the project
      sc - the scanner object used to capture user input
      data - the data object containing the list of projects

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(Project project, Data data)
      Deletes the specified project and removes it from the data. The project is then set to null.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to be deleted
      data - the data object containing the project list

    • generateReport

      public static void generateReport(Project project, Scanner sc)
      Generates a report for the specified project, allowing the user to filter the applications based on criteria such as flat type, age range, and marital status. The generated report is saved as a text file with a timestamped filename.
      Parameters:
      project - the project for which the report is generated
      sc - the scanner object used to capture user input for filtering and generating the report
